wrongNetwork: You are on the wrong network
installWeb3MobileBrowser: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
installMetamask: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.
betaWarning: This project is in beta. Use at your own risk.
searchOrPaste: Search Token Name, Symbol, or Address
unknownError: Oops! An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page, or visit from another browser or device.
enterValueCont: Enter a {{ missingCurrencyValue }} value to continue.
noRecipient: Enter a wallet address to send to.
invalidRecipient: Please enter a valid wallet address recipient.
mustBeETH: One of the input must be ETH.
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: Enter a {{ inputCurrency }} or {{ label }} value to continue.
totalSupplyIs: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is
youAreSettingExRate: You are setting the initial exchange rate to
totalSupplyIs0: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is 0.
tokenWorth: At current exchange rate, each pool token is worth
firstLiquidity: You are the first person to add liquidity!
initialExchangeRate: The initial exchange rate will be set based on your deposits. Please make sure that your DEV and {{ label }} deposits have the same fiat value.
enterLabelCont: Enter a {{ label }} value to continue.
label: Label
name: Name
enterTokenCont: Enter a token address to continue
brokenToken: The selected token is not compatible with Uniswap V1. Adding liquidity will result in locked funds.
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
connectToViewLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
expertModeTips1: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
expertModeTips2: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
supportNetwork: Please connect to the supported network.
supportNetworkError: Error connecting. Try refreshing the page.
terms1: By connecting a wallet, you agree to BOASwap
terms2: and acknowledge that you have read and understood the BOASwap
yourTransactionMayBeFrontRun: Your transaction may be front run
transactionDeadLineHelper: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
commonBasesHelper: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
tradeHelper: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
priceImpactHelper: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
feeHelper: There is a 1.5% fee for swapping tokens.This fee is split by liquidity providers proportional to their contribution to liquidity reserves. And it is possible that a protocol-wide charge of 0.5% per trade will take effect. This represents 1/3th of the 1.5% fee.
minimumReceivedHelper: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
gasTokenUseHelper: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
bridgeGasTokenUseHelper: Used to cover the gas cost for sending your transfer on the destination chain.
poolHelper: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens that represent your share.
importPoolHelper: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
addHelper: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removeHelper: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
selectTokenPointHelper: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
addListHelper: Token lists are an open specification for lists of ERC20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious ERC20 tokens.
addListPlaceholder: https:// or ipfs:// or ENS name
priceSwapHelper: The amount you expect to receive at the current market price. You may receive less or more if the market price changes while your transaction is pending.
rateHelper: Fixed exchange rate. The amount you will receive from the destination chain can be received excluding fees and gas fee from the transmission amount.
bridgeRelayOut: Bridge relay node out of service
slippageHelper: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
routeHelper: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
liquidityInfo: Output is estimated. If the price changes by more than {{percent}}% your transaction will revert.
waitingForConfirmationInfo: Confirm this transaction in your wallet
bridgeConfirmInfo1: Output is estimated. You will receive at least
bridgeConfirmInfo2: or the transaction will revert. If the transaction is reverted, the gas fee will be consumed.
bridgeConfirmInfo3: Output will be sent to recipient.(The incoming address is sent to the same address as the sender)
swapConfirmInfo1: Output is estimated. You will receive at least
swapConfirmInfo3: Input is estimated. You will sell at most
transactionConfirmationInfo1: An error occurred while the transaction was in progress.
transactionConfirmationInfo2: The transaction is in progress. Please wait without closing the window. The transaction may take 3 minutes to 1 hour.
